nodes.text: Karyn I'Yin was a female member of the Sisters of Sarrav who was quoted speaking about all things being bound to the Force in Collected Poems, Prayers, and Meditations on the Force, a compilation of writings on the Force edited by the Disciple of the Whills Kozem Pel.
Karyn I'Yin was first mentioned as part of a chapter quote in the novel Guardians of the Whills, which was written by Greg Rucka and released on May 2, 2017.
